questions.question: What is Newton's First Law of Motion?
options: An object remains at rest or in motion unless acted upon by a force
For every action there is an equal and opposite reaction
Energy cannot be created or destroyed
questions.correctAnswer: An object remains at rest or in motion unless acted upon by a force
questions.explanation: Newton's First Law of Motion states that an object will remain at rest or in uniform motion in a straight line unless acted upon by an external force.
